constituent: slippery, water, water droplets, water pistol, skeleton, joint, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
koohiiStory1: Don´t give water to a skeleton. When he drinks it, it´ll sluice right through his bones, forcing you to put one of those "Caution - Slippery Floor" signs up on the resultant puddle.
koohiiStory2: Slippery surfaces are very dangerous for skeletons, since their bone feet slip easily... a few drops of water, and zweep! A large mess of bones to pick up and reassemble!
readingExamples: 滑る (すべ.る), 滑らか (なめ.らか)
words: funny, humorous, comical, laughable, ridiculous, joking
to slide, to slip, to glide
